n = int(input())
while(n>0):
    n-=1
    a = int(input())
    print("*")
    for i in range(2,a):
        print("*", end='')
        print(" "*(i-2), end='')
        print("*")
    if(a!=1):
        print("*"*a)

n = int(input())
while(n>0):
    n-=1
    a = int(input())
    print("*")
    for i in range(2,a):
        print("*", end='')
        print(" "*(i-2), end='')
        print("*")
    if(a!=1):
        print("*"*a)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())

    l = [[' '] * i for i in range(1, n+1)]

    for i in range(n-1):
        l[i][0] = l[i][-1] = '*'
        print(*l[i], sep='')

    print('*' * n)
